title: Reliance Capital resolution: Lenders warn of remedial action against Hinduja's IIHL
description: Lenders of Reliance Capital cautioned Hinduja Group's IndusInd International Holdings for missing NCLT-imposed deposit conditions, including Rs 250 crore in a domestic escrow account and Rs 2,500 crore offshore. Given a final extension till August 10, IIHL has yet to meet deadlines, prompting lenders to reserve remedial rights.
